definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: mortar (place of pounding, braying; cf. Palm. n.pr.m. [[מכתש]] = contundens Vog:No. 97)—abs. ´[[מ]] Pr 27:22 (v. foregoing); hollow resembling a mortar Ju Jdg 15:19 (whence came forth a water-spring; cf. GFM), Zep 1:11 = a part of Jerusalem, cf. Schwally:ZAW x. (1890), 173 f.
